stories.text:
Hi HN,

As the Covid is slowly fading away and the meetup/conference season is starting up again, I needed a quick tool to generate various business cards as QR codes. A good excuse to learn about contact card formats (vCard, MeCard).

So here it is: you can generate QR codes using the online form, and embed SVG/PNG QR codes wherever you like (Website, Markdown, Slides, GitHub README).

The app is FOSS and code source is on GitHub: https://github.com/rclement/business-card-generator
stories.title: Show HN: Generate QR-Code Business Cards

stories.text:
Hi HN,

How would you suggest going about learning React, one of my concerns is that is a pretty unopinionated framework and its easy to shoot yourself in the foot if you dont know what you're doing, so any suggestions or experiences that'd help make this process easier? Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: How to go about learning react from ground up?
